name: SCP Foundation Dungeon
summary: Adds the SCP foundation as a dungeon that can spawn (by default on Titan, config can be adjusted to spawn on a variety of different moons including custom ones) Includes custom assets in the SCP style, and a fully functional SCP 914 if you can find it.

videos.name: Teaser
videos.title: Lethal Company - SCP Facility mod WIP
